description: Values query type - specialized query that returns value/label pairs for UI selectors (dropdowns, filters, autocomplete). Inherits all query properties but enforces returns_schema_id to point to values schema.

returns_schema_id.description: Fixed reference to values schema. This query type always returns value/label pairs.

examples.name: Region Filter Values
examples.description: List of available regions for filtering. Returns region codes with human-readable labels for dropdown selectors and filter controls.
